General help

Location: General help


Font size

The font size on these pages is set to "100%", which instructs the browser to use your default settings. To reset your default font:
  • Internet Explorer: size click on "view" in the menu bar (or enter -v on the keyboard), then select "font size". </li>
  • Firefox: Select "edit" from the menu bar, then "preferences". In the pop-up, select "content": the "fonts & colours" section should be half way down the pop-up box. </ul> </td></tr></table>
